# *
Thirteen spokesmen for educational television share with you
the story of their pioneering and experimentation in the field
of educational television®
"Voices of Experience" is a report of a program presented in
cooperation with the Joint Committee on Educational Television
at the 68th annual meeting of the Association of Land Grant
Colleges and Universities in November 195U*
The report includes appraisals of televised education by a
college president, a station manager, a university extension
director® It discusses television's effectiveness in adult
education, its place in the university curriculum and its
role in supplementary state-wide educational services® It
describes the potential audience to be served and some of the
programming possibilities for the educational establishment®
To the extent that these stories can be told in one morning's
session, "Voices of Experience" is a thoughtful evaluation of
higher education's role in the first few years of educational
television®
Ralph Steetle
Executive Director
